attributes.action: The Broadway Surgery - Woodford Green, Essex
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.nhs.uk/Services/GP/Overview/DefaultView.aspx?id=41681

The above link is a review page for The (appauling) Broadway Surgery in Woodford Green, Essex.

The Broadway Surgery is owned by the doctors and they have an NHS contract saying that they effectively work for themselves - NOT the people of our community.

Sign this petition if you feel that the NHS should actaully read the reviews left by our community and do something to ensure that we are getting proper health care!!! OR failing this take away their NHS contracts.
